```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tableone)
library(sjPlot)
library(tidyr)
library(janitor)

source("../utility_fun.R")
```

```{r}
data_wide <- read.csv("../data/dataset_wide.csv")
data_long <- read.csv("../data/dataset_long.csv")
```

```{r}
# Numbers in abstract
## Total N
N <- length(unique(data_wide$src_subject_id))
## Mean age at baseline
data_long %>% filter(eventname == "baseline_year_1_arm_1") %>% summarise(mean = mean(interview_age, na.rm = T)/12)
## % of females
prop.table(table(data_wide$sex_br))
## % of headache
table(data_wide$headache_ever) # 907
907/N

## Discovery sample
abcd_gr1 <- read_rds("../outputs/abcd_gr1.rds")
abcd_gr1_wide <-
    abcd_gr1 %>% select(matches("src|eventname|medhx_2q_l")) %>% 
    pivot_wider(., names_from = eventname, values_from = medhx_2q_l) %>%
    remove_empty(., which = c("rows", "cols"), quiet = TRUE)

abcd_gr1_wide$headache_ever <- apply(abcd_gr1_wide[, grepl("year", colnames(abcd_gr1_wide))], 1, function(x) {any(x == 1)*1})
### Numbers for abstract
# discovery subsample (n=XX, YY headache) (5784, 426 (13.39%))
length(unique(abcd_gr1$src_subject_id))
table(abcd_gr1_wide$headache_ever)
prop.table(table(abcd_gr1_wide$headache_ever))


abcd_gr2 <- read_rds("../outputs/abcd_gr2.rds")
abcd_gr2_wide <-
    abcd_gr2 %>% select(matches("src|eventname|medhx_2q_l")) %>% 
    pivot_wider(., names_from = eventname, values_from = medhx_2q_l) %>%
    remove_empty(., which = c("rows", "cols"), quiet = TRUE)

abcd_gr2_wide$headache_ever <- apply(abcd_gr2_wide[, grepl("year", colnames(abcd_gr2_wide))], 1, function(x) {any(x == 1)*1})
### Numbers for abstract
# testing subsample (n=XX, YY headache) (5784, 459 (14.69%))
length(unique(abcd_gr2$src_subject_id))
table(abcd_gr2_wide$headache_ever)
prop.table(table(abcd_gr2_wide$headache_ever))
```

```{r}
# table 1: by headache ever
table1_var <- data_wide %>% 
    select(matches(c("age_years__2y", "sex_br", "race", "ethnicity", "_income$"))) %>% #"poverty_line$", 
    names()

table1_factor <- table1_var[!table1_var %in% c("age_years__2y", "household_income")]


write.csv(
    print(
        CreateTableOne(
            data = data_wide,
            vars = table1_var,
            strata = "headache_ever",
            factorVars = table1_factor,
            includeNA = T,
            addOverall = T
        ),
        pDigits = 5,
        catDigits = 2,
        contDigits = 2
    ),
    "../outputs/table1_main_values_120722.csv"
)


# FDR-adjusted p-values
table1_adj_p <- 
    round(p.adjust(c(0.03369, 0.66945, 0.00001, 0.00001, 0.00002, 0.81631, 0.64358, 0.09838, 0.00009, 0.00789, 0.00001), method = "fdr"), 3)


# create migraine PRS among Euro ancestry (white)
# don't have PRS among African ancestry
```

```{r}
# Table 2: internal validation headache and medication/PRS
# mod_headache_med1 <- glmer(data = data_long, 
#                            medhx_2q_l ~ Migraine.Medications_2w + scale(age_years) + scale(age_years)^2 + scale(age_years)^3 + 
#                                sex_br + race_black + race_white + household_income + ethnicity_hisp +
#                                (1 | site_id_l_br/rel_family_id/src_subject_id), family = binomial, nAGQ = 0)

mod_headache_med2 <- glmer(data = data_long, 
                           medhx_2q_l ~ Daily.Preventive.medications_2w + scale(age_years) + scale(age_years)^2 + scale(age_years)^3  + 
                               sex_br + race_black + race_white + household_income + ethnicity_hisp +
                               (1 | site_id_l_br/rel_family_id/src_subject_id), family = binomial, nAGQ = 0)

mod_headache_med3 <- glmer(data = data_long, 
                           medhx_2q_l ~ Migraine.Rescue.medications_2w + scale(age_years) + scale(age_years)^2 + scale(age_years)^3  + 
                               sex_br + race_black + race_white + household_income + ethnicity_hisp +
                               (1 | site_id_l_br/rel_family_id/src_subject_id), family = binomial, nAGQ = 0)

mod_headache_prs <- glmer(data = data_long, 
                          medhx_2q_l ~ migraine_PRS_EUR + scale(age_years) + scale(age_years)^2 + scale(age_years)^3  + 
                              sex_br + race_black + race_white + household_income + ethnicity_hisp +
                              (1 | site_id_l_br/rel_family_id/src_subject_id), family = binomial, nAGQ = 0)

tab_model(mod_headache_med2, mod_headache_med3, mod_headache_prs, show.intercept = F)
```

```{r}
# eTable 2: compare missing data and non missing data
## create the missing column for outcome
data_wide <- data_wide %>% 
    mutate(headache_missing = case_when(is.na(headache_ever) ~ "Missing", TRUE ~ "Not missing"))

etable2_var <- data_wide %>% 
    select(matches("age_years__2y|sex_br|race|ethnicity|income$|edu$|daily_med_2w_ever|migraine_rescue_med_2w_ever|PRS_")) %>% 
    names()


write.csv(
    print(
        CreateTableOne(
            data = data_wide,
            vars = etable2_var,
            strata = "headache_missing",
            factorVars = c(
                "sex_br",
                "race_white",
                "race_black",
                "race_aian",
                "race_nhpi",
                "race_asian",
                "race_other",
                "race_mixed",
                "ethnicity_hisp",
                "daily_med_2w_ever",
                "migraine_rescue_med_2w_ever"
            ),
            includeNA = T,
            addOverall = T
        ),
        missing = F,
        pDigits = 5,
        catDigits = 2,
        contDigits = 2
    ),
    "../outputs/etable2_main_values_120722.csv"
)

# FDR-adjusted p-values
etable2_adj_p <- 
    round(p.adjust(c(.74941, 0.00001, 0.00001, 0.36594, 0.61156, 0.71581, 0.00001, 0.81857, 0.00001, 0.91797, 0.81678, 0.00001, 0.00001, 0.00402), method = "fdr"), 3)
```



```{r}
# etable 3: internal validation # by headache
etable3_var <- c("daily_med_2w_ever", "migraine_rescue_med_2w_ever") #, "migraine_PRS_EUR"

write.csv(

            data = data_wide,
            vars = etable3_var,

            factorVars = etable3_var,
            includeNA = T,
            addOverall = T
        ),
        missing = T,
        pDigits = 5,
        catDigits = 2,
        contDigits = 2
    ),
    "../outputs/etable3_main_values_120722.csv"
)

table2_adj_p <- round(p.adjust(c(0.00001, 0.00001), method = "fdr"), 3)

# Get number of missing data
naniar::miss_var_summary(data_wide %>% filter(!is.na(headache_ever)) %>% select(all_of(table1_var)))
```
